first_para: Sir Hugh Nigel Edward Bayley (born 9 January 1952) is a British Labour Party politician who was Member of Parliament for York Central, having held the predecessor City of York seat from 1992 to the 2010 general election, when boundary changes took effect.

full.extract: Sir Hugh Nigel Edward Bayley (born 9 January 1952) is a British Labour Party politician who was Member of Parliament for York Central, having held the predecessor City of York seat from 1992 to the 2010 general election, when boundary changes took effect.
full.title: Hugh Bayley
